events.narrative: Alice confirmed that she would get the contract signed today.
Bob decided that the 99.9% SLA is worth it for launch week peace of mind.
Alice confirmed that the payment provider can offer a 99.9% SLA for the enterprise tier and asked Bob if it's worth the extra cost.
Bob decided to hold off on the payment fallback integration while Alice checks with the payment provider about SLA guarantees.
Emma confirmed that PgBouncer was configured with a connection pool set to 100.
Emma finished setting up the auto-scaling configuration, allowing the system to handle 5x the current load automatically.
Bob acknowledged David's work and committed to reviewing the PR in the afternoon.
David completed the caching layer and performance tests showed a 3.2x improvement in response times.
